item.description:
Hi, I’m Andres Viloria ðŸ‘‹

Engineer with experience in analysis, processing, and visualization of information. Motivated and results-oriented data scientist with proven work in the data field and process mapping with knowledge of programming languages such as SQL, Java and Python. Knowledge of tools such as SQL Server Management Studio, Jupyter Notebook, Code Studio, Power BI, SSIS and Anaconda. Capacity for teamwork, initiative, logical thinking, and assertive communication.
I am currently a Correlation One fellow in the Data Science For All program.
